name: Wild Season (itch)
description:
Version 1.0.6.0 Update!

Build Notes:
- Bug fixes & optimizations

Wild Season is a farming-life sim taking its foundations from the greats within the farming simulation, visual novel, and RPG genres and delivers them with a twist. Rebuild your farm to its former glory and beyond, befriend the townspeople and maybe find your one true love (of either gender!), and solve the secret of Bedford Valley.


The Story

Weeks of being down on your luck at the big city, you've found your calling: farming!

A real estate agency is selling a beautiful farm property down south, and amazingly, you have just enough in your savings to buy it outright! Risking it all, you decide to leave the city in hopes of starting your farming dreams.

Getting caught in a bad storm, totaled your car, and now stuck in a foreign town with some of the strangest people you've ever met. To make things worse; the before-thought beautiful farm you bought is in severe disrepair and, according to the townsfolk, was never for sale in the first place!

You now find yourself in a seemingly hostile town where one mystery seems to just stack on another... Only one thing's for sure: the town is hiding something.

The Game
  • A detailed and intricately crafted world you can explore.
  • Build relationships, make friends, or enemies, and crazy exes.
  • Turn your newly acquired decrepit farm into one of the region's top farm.
  • Discover the deep dark secret of your town, why it will cause worlds to collide, and decide what you will do with that knowledge.

Features
  • Farming
  • Relationship Simulation
  • Same Sex Relationships!
  • Mini-games
  • Festivals
Planned Features
  • Ranching
  • Solving mysteries
  • Part-time jobs
  • Technology simulation
  • Festivals
  • Marriage
  • Babies and Adoption
  • Political System
